content: When trying to import the output of cg_reporting created by IG publisher through github i end up with You provided 'undefined' where a stream was expected. You can provide an Observable, Promise, Array, or Iterable.

https://github.com/patrick-werner/cg_reporting_output
i tried to import the whole folder 'report_resources'
currently issues on your github are disabled so i post the found issues here. But i can also file issues directly if this would be easier
@Patrick Werner , I will investigate your issue
We don't use GitHub Issues to track issues... We use Atlassian JIRA, here: https://trifolia.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/3
If you click the "Support Request" button in the lower-right of Trifolia-on-FHIR, it will open Atlassian JIRA for you.
Take note, though, that an Atlassian account is needed to create issues/tickets in JIRA
perfect. I will post future issues there.
@Patrick Werner , I have invited you to sign up with an atlassian account to access the ToF support system
Additionally, I created a support request for you, here: https://trifolia.atlassian.net/servicedesk/customer/portal/3/TOFSUP-23
